official_title: To provide emergency assistance to local public libraries for the purchase of books and other library materials and resources.

summary.text: Emergency Book Fund Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to allocate supplementary funds to State library administrative agencies for public libraries to use to purchase books and other library materials and resources. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide emergency assistance to local public libraries for the purchase of books and other library materials and resources.
